examples.example: 西医的专业知识和精湛技术为许多患者带来了康复的希望。

translate.english: The professional knowledge and superb technology of Western medicine have brought the hope of recovery to many patients.

examples.example: 西医凭借先进的医疗手段和科学的治疗方法，帮助众多患者战胜了疾病。

translate.english: Western medicine, with advanced medical means and scientific treatment methods, has helped numerous patients overcome diseases.

examples.example: 西医们凭借着丰富的经验和高超的医术，拯救了无数生命。

translate.english: Western doctors, with their rich experience and superb medical skills, have saved countless lives.
